features: Amazing Fun Toy For Army Fans and Special Ops Enthusiasts - This 3-in-1 military mini action figure playset is a fantastic way to get kids into the world of toy building sets. It comes with 356 pieces to build 3 distinct action-packed troops with Infantry Battalion, Recon Outpost, Side Pursuit and many accessories. Build each army with the help of the instructions. Create epic battles while gaining unforgettable memories. Great for kids 10+ years old or younger with the help of adults!

Your Kid's New Favorite Toy - Enjoy watching your kids playing Special Troops for hours and hours. These army men toys for boys & girls engage your children's creativity, stimulating their imagination as they pretend with each detailed character. Kids will love creating remarkable scenes, building soldiers and vehicles, and using weapons to fire at imaginary targets. Each model features a movable part to encourage your child's fine motor skills as they explore creative ways to use it

Play Action with Superior Quality - Made from high quality and durable material, it will withstand years of play. It comes with an insane amount of accessories, including weapons, armors, snowmobiles, etc. Assign each battle its unique scenery and never be bored again. Colorful and well-made, it'll be a great addition to your child's toy box

A Great Collectable Gift - This Special Troops set is an excellent gift for birthdays, Christmas, and other special occasions. It comes in a beautiful, gift-able box that will "WOW" everyone. Everything needed to assemble and display a great army collection is in the box. The pieces are high quality and comparable with the best. Kids can create an imaginary environment to play and have fun together. They will strengthen their relationships while practicing and improving social skills

Rani Prize means 100% Satisfaction - At Rani Prize, we provide a 100% satisfaction experience to our customers. We will do everything possible to give you the best experience. Our 3-in-1 Special Troops set comes in a beautiful, giftable box and includes 356 pieces to build 3 distinct action-packed troops - Infantry Battalion, Recon Outpost, Side Pursuit

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If your little one loves army stuff, this toy is a fantastic way to get them into the world of toy building sets! This 3-in-1 troop playset comes with 356 pieces to build three distinct troops - Infantry Battalion, Recon Outpost, and Side Pursuit. Just follow the included instructions to build up your army. Then start playing and creating epic battles while gaining unforgettable memories.

Your Kids Will Love Special Troops You'll love watching your kids play with these toys for hours and hours! Engage Your Child's Creativity and Stimulate Their Imagination Kids will build and create detailed characters, and they'll hone their motor skills as they play with the movable parts. Spend Precious Time with Your Kids Special Troops gives you everything you need to enjoy hours of fun with your kids and create unforgettable memories Collect Them All! Collect all 3 special troops in the series and unlock even more exciting gameplay options and create more fun ways to play

Interactive and Educational Special Troops Set Designed to let them build three fun and unique special troops squads this 3-in-1 toy set makes indoor and outdoor play even more engaging and enjoyable. 356 pieces to build 3 special troops squads including:Infantry BattalionRecon OutpostSide PursuitVariety of weapons and accessoriesStep-by-step InstructionsFun for Ages 9 and Up

Collect Them All! Collect Them All! Rani Prize is a trusted and well-experienced brand that focuses on delivering premium, affordable toy sets and accessories which are meant to add fun and creativity to your little one’s playtime, without interfering with their comfort or safety. We make it a rule from only employing highest quality materials and verified manufacturers, in order to meet every parent’s rigorous expectations. Not entirely happy with what you received? Tell us all about it and our customer care department will immediately address any issues or concerns! Collect all 4 special troops in the series and unlock even more exciting gameplay options and create more fun ways to play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the details
reviews.reviewText: Super cute set for my military-obsessed 10-year old. He assembled by himself but commented on how sore his thumbs were afterward. Really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overpriced for the quality and the headache.
reviews.reviewText: The package had missing pieces, the small tarp that has the holes to attach to the tent, are too close to the edge so they ripped off almost immediately. Amazon did great as they sent a second package. The second package was still missing instructions and some pieces, I had to use first package instructions and combine parts and pieces. Instructions are 90% clear. There were a few missing steps (it literally it jumped from step 6 at the end of page 1 and resume at Step 10 on the other side). Somehow I was still able to put it together based on the picture itself. Overall the toy is not bad, but always could be better. Note to people buying for the first time, these toys require time to assemble, they are very small, so assembling tiny pieces can be an art of patience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars De mis favoritos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nephew says they are just ok
reviews.reviewText: Some of the men came with two left legs and some of the pieces don't stay together that well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took 18-22 pieces to make one tiny soldier. The directions for the fort called for pieces that were not included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I tried putting one if the people together and noticed it was difficult to put the legs on, it eventually broke and now one of them has no legs :/. Overall I like the set, its well made just be sure to be careful putting the characters together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars waste of money very hard to put together
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my grandson, thought they were like legos but they are not even close. he is 8 years old and the figures are so hard to snap together, his uncle had to do it. the directions are confusing and all the parts come in seperate bags but cant tell which bag goes with the confusing directions..I definetly will never buy this product again I will pay the extra money and stick with the Lego Brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Copyrighted Mega Bloks
reviews.reviewText: its not part of Mega Bloks and mega brands. stop
